name: heftily
content:
Add to word list

in a way that is large in amount, size, force, etc. : He was handsome, tall, and more heftily built than she remembered. If the people responsible for the littering are ever caught, they will be fined heftily. The heftily detailed biography is the most comprehensive work on the artist to date, running to over 700 pages. Related word
